text:
@LBC @ianpaynesport @CWhittaker_MP Would Mr Whittaker like to guess the ethnicity of the first five doctors to die of covid19, all of whom contracted the disease while working for the NHS?

No-nothing doctors who didn't take it seriously enough, evidently.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
